doc.content: Q: I am a medical student interested in nutrition research. What is your opinion of the Nutritional Academies of Science 2003 report "Nutrient Requirements of Dogs and Cats"? There's nothing like it for humans! My parents and grandparents on my mother's side are whole-food advocates. They taught me early on about the "four white evils." Do those also apply to dogs and cats? -- Anonymous, Baltimore, Md. A: You asked me to withhold your name because you don't want to get in trouble with your professors. Hopefully, there's one who advocates the nutritional wisdom of whole foods and balanced nutrition.
